[[File:SelectColor.png|thumb|The select color menu for the [[crosshair]] in [[Oniria]].]] The '''select color''' menu is a hardcoded menu class used to modify [[CVARs#color|color]] [[CVARs]]. The [[MENUDEF]] class is ColorPicker.
Color pickers are used as submenus for most entries in [[set custom colors]] menu and in the [[HUD options]] menu to change [[crosshair]] color.
The interface allows to set the red, green, and blue components for the color with color sliders, or to pick one color from the game [[palette]]. A preview show the selected color and the current setting side to side; the "{{CCMD|O|undocolorpic|undo changes}}" action can be used to reset the color to its original value before entering the menu. A menu subtitle reminds you of which color you are changing exactly. [[Category:Menus]]
